content: combination summer hat finished measurements all sizes are 20 in 50 8 cm around the unstretched band short s 9 in 22 9 cm long ​ medium m 10 in 25 4 cm long ​ large l 12 in 30 5 cm long ​ gauge knitting 20 sts in k1p1 rib is approximately 4 ​ crochet after first 3 rounds piece measures 4 5 in ​ diameter note all crochet terms are in us terminology ​ abbreviations in - inches cm - centimeters the knitted band is nice and stretchy to fit a range of head sizes while the crochet mesh slouches over in g - grams three lengths since the band draws the crochet together to fit the hat you could change the crochet chain s - chain s hook size to bring the hat out or in at the sides and still have the band to help ensure fit chain space - chain space hook & needles st s - stitch es space s - space s size k 6 5 mm crochet hook slip_stitch - slip_stitch size 8 5 mm 16 circular knitting needle skip - skip size 10 6 mm knitting needle for binding off single_crochet - single_crochet adjust size as necessary treble_crochet - treble_crochet/triple crochet yarn k - knit 100g worsted weight cotton yarn p - purl notions - brackets indicate a pattern repeat needle to weave in ends stitch marker © 2020 amanda skinner strangeknits com 1 ​ written pattern instructions round 13 chain 3 counts as first double_crochet chain 1 skip 1 double_crochet in next ​ body crochet with k hook treble_crochet chain 1 skip 1 to end of round slip_stitch join in top of first chain 3 72 sts total 36 double_crochet + 36 chain space round 1 begin with 12 single_crochet in a ring slip_stitch join in first single_crochet ​ 12 sts total 12 single_crochet for size s continue to band instructions round 2 chain 3 counts as first double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in next single_crochet ​ chain 1 to end of round slip_stitch join in top of first chain 3 size m and l only 24 sts total 12 double_crochet + 12 chain space round 14 repeat round 8 ​ round 3 chain 4 counts as first treble_crochet 2 treble_crochet in next chain space 1 ​ treble_crochet in next double_crochet 2 treble_crochet in next chain space to end of round slip_stitch round 15 chain 1 single_crochet in same st as join 1 single_crochet in each st ​ join in top of first chain 4 and chain space to end of round slip_stitch join in first single_crochet 36 sts total 36 treble_crochet 72 sts total 72 single_crochet round 4 ​ chain 3 counts as first double_crochet chain 2 skip 1 treble_crochet double_crochet in band knit with size 8 needles next treble_crochet chain 2 skip 1 treble_crochet to end of round slip_stitch join in top of first chain 3 54 sts total 18 double_crochet + 36 chain start-up round ​ transfer loop
